description.p: A finely crafted Greatsword, with engravings of an expert craftsman.
A silver wand with a red gemstone at the end of it. When equipped, any casted fire-based spells with it will add +1 to damage.
A silver staff that gives off a strong dark aura, giving those around a sense of fear.

Upon grabbing the staff, an Intelligance Saving Throw must be made. Upon failure, the staff must be dropped out of fear that fills the holder. On success, they'll overcome the fear and begin to give off a dark aura to those around them.

If the user continues to hold the staff, they'll become attached to it and not want to let go of it. All spells casted that aren't Necromacy based will be casted with disadvatage, but Necromacy-based spells will get a 1D4 to add to each their rolls, on both attacking, damage, and added to their DC.

The user's alignment will begin to shift towards begin evil, solely looking for the benefit of themselves, even at the detriment of their party members. If they try to take thee staff away, the holder will resist.

A 4-pronged arrow made of a white stone. The tip of the arrow seems study, but many cracks encompass the tip. Upon impact, the head of the arrow will shatter, dealing additional shrapnel damage to the target. Additional 1D4 on damage.
